meanings.sent1: The new sandals were thongier than the old ones.
meanings.sent2: Her collection of flip-flops keeps getting thongier every summer.
meanings.sent3: The beachgoer's thongier footwear made her friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The thongier design of the sandals hugged her feet like a second skin.
meanings.sent5: The thongier straps provided better support for her long walks.

meanings.sent1: The thongier belt had multiple straps for decoration.
meanings.sent2: The thongier bag had extra compartments for organizing items.
meanings.sent3: The thongier backpack looked like it could carry a whole library.
meanings.sent4: The thongier collar on the dog's leash jingled with every step.
meanings.sent5: The thongier headband had colorful beads woven into the strands.

meanings.sent1: The thongier swimsuit bottoms were popular at the beach.
meanings.sent2: Her thongier phone case had a slim and sleek design.
meanings.sent3: The thongier curtain tie-backs added a quirky touch to the room.
meanings.sent4: The thongier headband looked like a mini version of a sandal.
meanings.sent5: The thongier seat cushion had a unique cutout pattern.
